overview:
Erick Gaston is a UX Director & Founder of the UX Consulting group Orbtec Design, and a Co-Founder of Scrratch. Erick has over 10 years of experience in Information Architecture and User Experience and has worked accross a broad spectrum of industries including advertising, education, consulting and financial services and has experience with top tier clients such as American Express, Nike, Cartier, LG, Scholastic, IBM and Pfizer among others.

Erick graduated from New York University majoring in Information Systems Management with a focus on Internet & eCommerce and is JLPT3 certified in Japanese.

Specialties: small business management, mobile UX, interaction design, user experience design, information architecture, data visualization, social media
